Nightstrike:

"He's the biggest idiot that I've seen in my life!!!!!" thought 
Nightstrike while he shot against Alliance


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Symphony::
> 
>      "ya, whatever!  I'm getting there!" Symphony said cockily.
> 
>       He took his machine gun, and started firing concentrated 
shots at one certain spot on the CF.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2001 2:04 AM
>   Subject: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian
> 
> 
>   Nightstrike::
> 
>   "NO AGAINST US IDIOT!!!!!" Roared Nighstrike while he avoided 
>   Synphony's shots "AGAINST MAXIMALS AND THEIR ALLIESS!!!!!!"
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
>   > ::Symphony::
>   > 
>   >       Symphony lost some of his fear, which was being replaced 
with 
>   anger.
>   > 
>   >        "FINE THEN!" Symphony yelled back at Nightstrike.
>   > 
>   >         Symphony took his machine gun, and started shooting 
shots 
>   everywhere, spinning fastly in a circle.  A few shots hit 
Surgital, 
>   but didn't affect him.  Some shots went towards Alliance members, 
>   some towards Maxis, some towards the CF, some towards 
>   Symphony's "fellow" Decepticons, and some towards nowhere.  
Symphony 
>   just closed his eyes, and kept going around, and around, and 
around, 
>   shooting, and shooting, and shooting, like he just didn't care, 
his 
>   face without expression.
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: airly2000@y... 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2001 1:56 AM
>   >   Subject: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Nightstrike:
>   > 
>   >   Nightstrike shouted anger at Synphony "COME ON, YOU LITTLE-
BOT... 
>   IF 
>   >   YOU WANT TO BE A WARRIOR YOU SHOULD SHOT AGAINST ALL YOUR 
>   ENEMIES!!!!"
>   > 
>   >   After that he fired two missiles agaisnt LAvatron
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
>   >   > OOC: That's okay, yah dont need to say sorry.

didn't

>   huge 
>   >   spread
>   >   > of lasers from his gun.
